column1: 50554,Spider-Verse (2014) #1,1,76536,18,SPIDER-VERSE IS HERE! - Dive deep into the Spider-Verse event with the most Spider-filled anthology ever! - ASM team DAN SLOTT & HUMBERTO RAMOS kick it all off! - Skottie Young (ROCKET RACCOON) & Jake Parker (ALL-NEW X-MEN) tell a Mangaverse Spidey story! - Robbie Thompson (writer of television's Supernatural) and Dennis Medri introduce a Steampunk Spider-Woman! - Katie Cook (Marvel animal variants) introduces a new Spider-Character for the ages!,,
